hero.title: Vue SSR Starter Kit
hero.subtitle: Production-ready boilerplate for Vue 3, Express & MongoDB
hero.description: A complete foundation for building modern web applications with Server-Side Rendering, authentication, internationalization, and an admin panel — all included.

ssr.title: Server-Side Rendering
ssr.description: Full SSR with Vite and Vue 3. Fast initial load, SEO-optimized pages, and seamless client hydration.

auth.title: Authentication
auth.description: Email security code flow, sessions, bcryptjs password hashing, and rate limiting on all auth endpoints.

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.description: Built-in EN/FR support with Vue i18n. Easily extend to more languages by adding JSON files.

admin.title: Admin Panel
admin.description: User management with role-based access control (user/admin) and a protected admin interface.

ui.title: Vuetify UI
ui.description: Material Design 3 components with light/dark theme support and a SCSS design system.

security.title: Security
security.description: Helmet headers, CORS whitelist, HTTP-only session cookies, rate limiting, and input validation.

opensource.title: Open Source
opensource.description: Free and open source. Fork it, customize it, build on it.

index.title: Vue SSR Starter Kit
index.description: Production-ready boilerplate for Vue 3, Express and MongoDB with SSR, authentication, i18n, and admin panel.
